About Sweet Lou

I specialize in the repair of classic cars and I have a passion for making sure these old gems continue to run and look good for years to come. Whether it be a 1930's era roadster, a '57 Chevy Bel Air, or a muscle car of the 60's, I can fix it up, restore it and keep it in tip-top shape. I have the experience, tools and expertise to tune carbureted engines and the manufacturing capabilities to create parts that are no longer available. I also have a 30 day satisfaction guarantee. If you're not satisfied, I'll make it right!

Fill out the contact form if you have any questions!
